peer group.translation[0].definitions[0]: a group of people, especially people who are the same age, social class etc as yourself
the TV shows that are popular with his peer group
peer group.translation[1].definitions[0]: a group of companies or products that can be compared because they are similar in a number of ways
The stock isnâ€™t significantly more expensive than others in its peer group.
peer group.translation[1].definitions[1]: a group of people who influence each other because they are the same age, have the same job, social position etc
Trainees can discuss the job with their peer group at an induction day.
Peer group pressure (=the influence that people like you have on you) is effective when selling ideas.
